term.title: photon

item.text: Particle of zero charge, zero rest mass, spin quantum number 1, energy hν and momentumhν/c(h is the Planck constant, ν the frequency of radiation and c the speed of light), carrier of electromagnetic force.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2223. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2262 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122223)
